ABOUT

I was born and raised in Pontiac, Illinois. My fascination for computers came at a young age playing my brother's Nintendo. I graduate Eureka College in December, and I'm excited to explore the software development world first-hand.

EXPERIENCE

Interim Web Coordinator / Web Coordinator's Assistant
Eureka College

Initiated site redesign, managed a team to collect and organize web content from the old website and repurpose it for the new one. Converted over 4,000 pages of content to a much more elegant user experience. Eased the transition of my replacement, and currently serve as his assistant.

OCTOBER 2012 - DECEMBER 2014

President and Former Treasurer
Delta Sigma Phi - Zeta Upsilon Chapter

While Treasurer, managed nearly $25,000 chapter budget, ending the year with a surplus. Organized a 24-Hour Teeter Totter Event for the American Red Cross to raise $4,000+. Reinvigorated alumni involvement in the chapter, leading to increased donations. Led a chapter of 25-30 members to their first Chapter of Distinction award from the national level.

JANUARY 2013 - DECEMBER 2014

Over 3,000 people applied to get into one of 120 seats at the Academy. After being admitted, received $4,000 to attend MakeGamesWithUs Summer Academy.
